questions.question_text: A cross object formula references fields from parent objects.

discussion.content: A cross-object formula can reference merge fields from a master (“parent”) object if an object is on the detail side of a master-detail relationship. A cross-object formula also works with lookup relationships.

Selected Answer: A

questions.question_text: On which of these areas Data Validation rules are enforced but no feedback is given to users?

discussion.content: You'll get errors during lead conversion or record merge if you hit validation rules. For web-to-case/lead, the user filling out the form will not get validation errors. The automated case user (in support settings) will get an email about the failure, but the end user will not.
